name: Phase 10
details:
10 stage phaserFrom a crawling slow slither to a fluttery and rubbery fast celerity, the Phase 10 offers a full ten-stages of phase-shifting gyration.
Dial in the rate you love on its [extended range] Rate knob and then brush on the Color to unlock the perfect glow and blossom, buttering your biscuit just how you like it.
A strikingly wide array of phase tones are held within the Phase 10's simple, yet intuitive, dual control knobs.  From airy-light swirl, to thick-as-molasses goo, the Phase 10 is sure to please and deliver an ear to ear grin.
The Phase 10's extra high-headroom and musical voicing allows it to perform excellently with bass, keys and synthesizers alike!
https://www.mrblackpedals.com/collections/pedals/products/phase-ten
